name: Marshmallow Bandit
description:
Marshmallow Bandit is a game made for Ludum Dare 51 themed around "Every 10 Seconds".

You play as a Marshmallow and your goal is to survive as long as possible by avoiding enemies, killing enemies with your water pistol, and reaching the next room within 10 seconds.

Every second you spare gives you bonus gold. Every so often you will encounter reward rooms where you can spend your gold to buy upgrades.

See how far you can make it!
